title: AWS
desc: During my tenure at AWS, I've effectively utilized diverse cloud services to optimize project scalability, reliability, and performance. Notably, I've strategically deployed applications using AWS EC2 instances, emphasizing efficient resource utilization. Storage solutions have centered around the dependable S3, complemented by AWS RDS for well-managed relational databases. Security has been a priority through the adept use of AWS IAM, while intricate network architectures, exemplified in projects like Amazon IoT migration using tools like Mosquitto, Prometheus, and Grafana, showcase my expertise in Amazon VPC. Embracing DevOps practices, I've streamlined workflows by integrating AWS CodePipeline and CodeDeploy, automating the software release process. My familiarity with event-based services, including Amazon Lambda, reflects adaptability to propose tailored solutions based on project needs, showcasing a comprehensive grasp of the AWS ecosystem.
